definition: surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: So saying sodium bicarbonate julep is in fact not true.
sentences.chinese: 所以说小苏打去黑头的说法其实不现实。

sentences.english: To the hot water, add about one cup of baking soda for each gallon of water.
sentences.chinese: 在热水中加入量为每加仑水一茶杯的小苏打。

sentences.english: Fill in nail holes in drywall with  toothpaste and baking soda.
sentences.chinese: 牙膏与小苏打混合可以用来填补墙面的钉子洞。

sentences.english: Gargle baking soda water to help with ulcers.
sentences.chinese: 用小苏打水来漱口可以预防溃疡。

sentences.english: Wash your  garbage cans with baking soda.
sentences.chinese: 可用小苏打清洗你的垃圾罐。

sentences.english: Clean corroded battery terminals with baking soda and water.
sentences.chinese: 小苏打水可以清洗腐蚀电池的两端。

sentences.english: Rinse your fruits and veggies with baking sod. Make sure you rinse well.
sentences.chinese: 用小苏打来清洗水果和蔬菜，保证你洗得很干净。

sentences.english: Sometimes it seems as if baking soda is good for just about anything, and it's certainly good for relieving heat rash.
sentences.chinese: 有时好像小苏打能做任何事，当然对减轻痱子也有效。

sentences.english: I have also been applying baking soda and apple cider vinegar to my face two or three times a week.
sentences.chinese: 最近每个礼拜都要两三次小苏打和苹果醋来敷脸。

sentences.english: I used baking soda before to kill stomachache, but this time I just feel my stomach bloated.
sentences.chinese: 我以前用过小苏打治胃疼，可这次我主要是胃胀。

sentences.english: Whisk together the sifted flour, baking powder and baking soda. Warm water and salt combined in another clean mixing bowl.
sentences.chinese: 面粉过筛后加入泡打粉和小苏打完全拌匀备用。

sentences.english: Mix the sieved flour, 50 grams of sugar, baking soda and salt in a bowl.
sentences.chinese: 面粉过筛，加入50克砂糖，小苏打和盐，混合均匀。

sentences.english: A paste of vinegar and baking soda will also work will on rusty shower stalls.
sentences.chinese: 甲醋和小苏打糊也将在生锈的淋浴间将。

sentences.english: Put out small fires out by  smothering it with baking soda.
sentences.chinese: 用小苏打窒息灭小规模的火灾。

sentences.english: Put it on a wet  sponge to clean crayon off a chalk board.
sentences.chinese: 湿海绵上放些小苏打可以擦掉黑板上的粉笔画。

sentences.english: So here is my list of the top uses for baking soda.
sentences.chinese: 所以这里我将罗列出小苏打最常见的用法。
